name.ja: アルトメギア・ヴァンダリズム－<ruby>襲<rt>しゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>撃<rt>げき</rt></ruby>－

text.en: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Medius the Innocent" from your Deck to your hand. You can target 1 face-up monster you control; that face-up monster can be treated as an "Artmegia" monster if used as Fusion Material this turn. You can only use this effect of "Artmegia Vandalism - Assault" once per turn. If "Artmegia the Academy City of Divine Arts" you control would be destroyed by card effect, you can send this card you control to the GY instead. You can only activate 1 "Artmegia Vandalism - Assault" per turn.
